New Records: Brandon Ingram scored a game-high 33 points for the New Orleans Pelicans.
Dejounte Murray recorded a triple-double with 14 points, 10 assists, and 8 rebounds.
Key Match Events: Brandon Ingram made key 3-pointers in the fourth quarter to extend the Pelicans' lead.
A 9-0 run in the third quarter by the Pelicans established a significant lead.
The Bulls' eighth-point run in the fourth quarter narrowed the deficit but couldn't overcome the Pelicans' lead.
Pre-Game Insights: Lonzo Ball returned from a knee injury and contributed five points, four assists, and two rebounds in 14 minutes.
Post-Match Reflections: New Orleans Pelicans head coach noted the team's effort and resilience in the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: CJ McCollum scored 23 points, and Yves Missi contributed 12 points as a rookie.
The Pelicans achieved a victory margin of 12 points.
